name: Customer Circuit Reference (T1)
title: CKR1
definition: Identifies the circuit number or range of circuit numbers used by the customer for the T1 Transport involved.
usageNotes: Required when the CKR1 field on the FGA Form or Trunking and ACI Forms are populated, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: CKR1 is used by the customer as a cross reference to the provider circuit ID(s) and in many cases to identify the customerâ€™s end-to-end service.
